column2: Infamy, Infamy, the damned Gods have it in for me!.
After After much work you have regained the powers your folly had lost.

After many years of hard work and gruelling practice, you have increased your ability in the magical arts. No longer are you limited to casting only the most basic cantrips, and those who would oppose you should take heed of your new found eldritch power.

After many years of hard work and gruelling practice, you have increased your ability in the magical arts. Your spells have reached dizzying heights that few may comprehend, and only fools would dare stand in your way now.

After many years of hard work and gruelling practice, you have increased your ability in the magical arts. You are now one of the strongest spellcasters in the history of the world, and even the thought of defying your will causes terror.

While contemplating the mysteries of the winds of magic, you have an epiphany regarding a magical theorem that had long evaded your grasp. You are now that much closer to becoming an even more powerful spellcaster.
Use the magic spells that [Root.GetBestName] knows.

Magic, a force most eldritch and mighty, it falls to you to command your wizard to direct these forces as you soo deem necessary. Choose from the known magics, and whether or not the magic shall find additional powers for their casting.

Beyond the usual wielding of spells for the winning of wars, your mages are fully capable of casting powerful effects in the service of the greater success of the realm. In this way, you as their liege can take actions to fuel the powe of their sorcery!
Your Mage shall wield only so much power as their abilities allow.
I shall invest moderately in their success!
By a small outlay, your mage is capable of casting as if he had one extra level of magic power.
I shall invest in their success!
By a larger outlay, your mage is capable of casting as if they had two extra levels of magic power.
I shall invest substantially in their success!
By your supreme investment, your mage is capable of casting as if they had three extra levels of magic power.
To command the forces of magic is to command power most unnatural, by channelling and directing these eldritch forces, the laws of the world but melt away.
To command the forces of magic is to command power most unnatural, by channelling and directing these eldritch forces, the laws of the world but melt away.
Lore of High Magic, Magic is Might!
Lore of Dark Magic, Magic is Might!
Lore of Necromancy, Magic is Might!
Master of the lore of the Arcane!
Your mastery of the lores of magic is so unrivaled, you can with effort call upon the effects of not only High Magic, but all 8 of the winds of magic themselves!

Lore of High Magic, Magic is Might!
Lore of the Beasts, Magic is Might!
Lore of the Heavens, Magic is Might!
This wizard is guiding the minds of their fellow warriors.
This wizard has enchanted his allies' weapons with fire magic.
This wizard has made his fellow warriors as fast as the Light.
This wizard has called upon the Wind of Hysh to protect and empower his allies.
This wizard is channelling death itself in order to slow their enemies.
An Amber Wizard has sent all critters and small animals in this province into a feeding frenzy, depleting its supplies.
A Gold Wizard has increased the weight of all metal in this province, slowing down all military movement.
A Gold Wizard has cursed this character and their troops by rusting their armour and weapons.
This wizard has hardened the metals composing the armours of their allies.
A Grey Wizard has casted an illusion of this character's worst terrors, plowing down theirs and their allies' morale.

As you have not selected a target using the target designation menu, you can now choose from a limited selection of characters possible targets.
I do not want to cast
Select your prefered target, either members of your realm, characters with whom you are at war or in conflict with. Or instead choose to target your friends and family.
Choose from the below to target members of your realm that meet the criteria
